project_descr: Responding to HIV and AIDS at the Workplace

outputs.output_descr: The long term outcome to which this project aims is to enhance Private Sector capacity to prevent new infections and mitigate the socio-economic impact of HIV and AIDS in the Workplace (and in the community). The objectives are to build capacity for integration of HIV and AIDS into private and informal sectors with clearly defined policies and implementation guidelines and protocols and to facilitate implementation and monitoring of workplace policies that combat HIV and AIDS as a means for mitigating the impact of the disease.

project_title: 3ken09302: responding to hiv and aids at the workplace
